code: import{RoomObjectVariable}from'../../RoomObjectVariable';import{IsometricImageFurniVisualization}from'./IsometricImageFurniVisualization';export class FurnitureGuildIsometricBadgeVisualization extends IsometricImageFurniVisualization{constructor(){super(...arguments);this._color1=void 0;this._color2=void 0;}updateModel(scale){const assetName=this.object.model.getValue(RoomObjectVariable.FURNITURE_GUILD_CUSTOMIZED_ASSET_NAME);if(assetName&&assetName.length)this.setThumbnailImages(this.getBitmapAsset(assetName));}const
